title: pyiron DAMASK multiple rolling example
description: Run a DAMASK multiple rolling simulation in pyiron

publication: Janssen, J., Surendralal, S., Lysogorskiy, Y., Todorova, M., Hickel, T., Drautz, R. and Neugebauer, J., 2019. pyiron: An integrated development environment for computational materials science. Computational Materials Science, 163, pp.24-36.
